EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in SpringOne Platform 2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Thanks for your interest in SpringOne Platform 2018! We’ll be sure to keep you posted on all things SpringOne Platform including early registration, relevant deadlines, and new content planned for the 2018 show.
Whether you're just embarking on your software transformation journey, or looking to completely replatform your IT to be more Agile and DevOps oriented, Pivotal can guide you on the right path.
<[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-dev/introduction]]> Start building today with a step-by-step tutorial <[[https://pivotal.io/platform/pcf-tutorials/getting-started-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry-dev/introduction]]> of how to get a sample app up and running using a free trial of Pivotal Cloud Foundry with Spring Cloud Services built in.
<[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx]]> To hear how our customers are using Pivotal to transform how the world builds software, check out the recorded sessions <[[https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLAdzTan_eSPQ1fuLSBhyB4eEZF7JQM0Mx]]> from 2016’s SpringOne Platform conference; they cover a wide range of topics from Cloud-Native Architectures, to Java, Data Microservices, DevOps, and much more.
Finally, take advantage of our library of resources:
- Customer case studies <[[https://content.pivotal.io/case-studies]]> - Upcoming and on-demand webinars <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars]]> and podcasts <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts]]> - Leading industry analyst reports <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports]]>
We hope you to see you at SpringOne Platform 2018!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
